attributes.title: ✨🧚🏿‍♂️

attributes.review: this is a horrible app. they really made an app for a president that looks like a cheeto. an orange???! he’s a horrible person and it really shows. everyone wants to say “make america great again” when was america ever great? taking land from our people. claiming it’s yours. racism all around. trump has never made this country safe, peaceful or great again. HE NEVER WILL. whoever supports him i feel bad for them. they honestly think that he’s doing a good job for this country when everyone is dying. what a shame. it hurts to see that ignorant white people stand by him. you could see that even his own family doesn’t like him. if i was his son i would show him who’s boss. his kid doesn’t even have a life. his wife spelled out help in a tweet. she never look happy around him. its just disgusting. what’s even more disgusting is hitting on your daughter talking about how hot and pretty she is and if you weren’t married to your current wife you would marry her. and talking about sex with her. he’s just a nasty little creep. he shouldn’t even have been elected in the first place. this “president” has almost started a war. called black peoples thugs just because we’re protesting for what we believe is right. yet again he wants to say if you don’t like it here then leave. i’m not leaving. my ancestors have been here longer than whites. but we had to work for them. he’s such a coward he has to have people surround him so nothing happens to him. everything the simpsons predicted happened. so how come donald trump hasn’t died yet. i just don’t understand how people can support a racist, a sexist, rapist. so much more. yet you guys see this child as our president. my president is Obama and nothing will change that. i’m just so done with 2020 and Trump. may he rest in hell.
attributes.title: Black and Hispanic Lives Matter
